attrib:
BEAR HP: 1400 / 1800 / 2300 / 2700
BEAR BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.75 / 1.65 / 1.55 / 1.45
BEAR ARMOR: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
BACKLASH DAMAGE: 10% max health as Pure damage
cmb:
MANA COST: 75/75/75/75
COOLDOWN: 180/160/140/120
desc: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  If the Spirit Bear dies, the Lone Druid suffers composite damage as backlash.  As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities.  Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.
notes:
Most spells interact with the Spirit Bear in the same way as they do with heroes.
You can't resummon the bear if it has taken damage in the past 3 seconds.
lore: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.
name: lone_druid_spirit_bear

attrib:

MOVEMENT SPEED: 5% / 10% / 15% / 20%
DURATION: 10 / 10 / 10 / 10
cmb:
MANA COST: 50/50/50/50
COOLDOWN: 30
desc: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.
lore: Bears are not commonly seen as being agile creatures, but can actually move rather quickly, especially when enraged.
name: lone_druid_rabid

attrib:

TRUE FORM BONUS HP: 100 / 200 / 300 / 400
desc: Increases the Lone Druid's synergy with his Spirit Bear and himself, upgrading attributes and abilities.
lore: Sylla studies and masters the arts of the lost Bear Clan, enhancing his attunement with the wild.
name: lone_druid_synergy

desc: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability.  He can morph freely between druid and bear form.
notes: You can dodge stuns during the 2 second duration of transforming.
lore: The mighty bear is the king of the forest, possessing the throne through raw power.
name: lone_druid_true_form
